alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Salt Lake...northwestern Utah and eastern Tooele Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 611 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Camp Williams, or 14 miles southwest of Sandy, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sandy, West Jordan, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Midvale, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Bluffdale, Cedar Fort, Camp Williams, Bingham Canyon Mine, Saratoga Springs, Fairfield and Copperton. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 284 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley
